title: CLDF dataset derived from Barrientos et al.'s "A Comparative Wordlist for Investigating Distant Relations Among Languages in Lowland South America (forthcoming).
citation: Barrientos, Carlos and Blum, Frederic and Ingunza, Adriano and Gonzales, Rosa and Pe√±a, Jaime. Forthcoming. A Comparative Wordlist for Investigating the history of north Peruvian isolates and small language families.
description: This dataset brings together lexidal data from isolates and small language families from northern Peru to investigate their historic relations.
